prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a unique body shape and a mystical aura.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles ancient toys, combining both charm and mystery.
Imagine a small, humanoid Pokemon with large, expressive eyes and a playful demeanor.
Generate a creature that embodies both psychic powers and whimsical design elements.

Give me a Pokemon that combines ancient themes with modern aesthetics in its design.
